column4: hi people. how would i go about converting a .mdf/.mds CD image file into ISO on ubuntu gutsy?
the fuseiso tool I belve can mount/access those. Check its website. and the fuse website for info on using fuse. There may be a fuseiso wiki page in the ubuntu wiki pages also
i recall the fuseiso site saying it could handle .nrg  and other formats.. perhaps it cant do them all.  I dont mess with   mdf files much
i wouldn't mess with them either, if i had a choice :D.
